subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Darrelle Revis, a four-time All-Pro cornerback, participated in practice on a limited basis and said he expected to play Sunday against Tennessee after sitting out the last two games.
snippet: Darrelle Revis, a four-time All-Pro cornerback, participated in practice on a limited basis and said he expected to play Sunday against Tennessee after sitting out the last two games.
